thread.title: Bipasha Basu’s Struggle With Working Out Is As Real As All Of Ours
thread.title_full: Bipasha Basu’s Struggle With Working Out Is As Real As All Of Ours

title: Bipasha Basu’s Struggle With Working Out Is As Real As All Of Ours
text:
facebook 
You needn’t feel guilty about sucking at exercising, while at the gym. If it makes you feel any better, even fit-girl Bipasha Basu has her dog days too, and they aren’t any different from ours. The actress recently posted a video, where she can be seen trying her best to sit straight on a training machine but despite her best efforts, collapses (it's dramatic, not real, so don't worry about her!) at every second. Behind the camera, her husband, Karan Singh Grover, can be heard talking to her, possibly helping her to stay awake. Though, in front of the camera, Bipasha continues to answer his questions in an indecipherable voice, which is all kinds of hilarious. A post shared by bipashabasusinghgrover (@bipashabasu) on Mar 26, 2017 at 10:06am PDT 
This video is proof that the ones with the best bods also have their share of total shutdowns and that it is okay to have an off day once in while. Next time, you can’t seem to function on the treadmill, give yourself a break. It’s all part of being human (Salman Khan would agree).
